alert.note: Alert for Flathead, Mission Valleys; Kootenai, Cabinet Region; Lower Clark Fork Region; West Glacier Region (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Missoula (Western Montana and Central Idaho)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 20 at 1:36PM MST by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...An area of heavy snow will impact portions of northwestern Mineral, northwestern Lake, southeastern Lincoln, northwestern Sanders and northern Flathead Counties through 230 PM MST... At 134 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking an an area of heavy snow across northwest Montana, including the Highway 200, US-2, and I-90 corridors. HAZARD...Visibility one-quarter mile or less. Snowfall rates up to two inches per hour. SOURCE...Area webcams and surface observations. IMPACT...Low visibility could result in dangerous driving conditions. Locations impacted include... Kalispell, Thompson Falls, Evergreen, Whitefish, Columbia Falls, West Glacier, De Borgia, Noxon, Haugan, Marias Pass, Trout Creek, Blacktail, Bend, Olney, Pinnacle, Logan Pass, Kila, Saltese, Martin City and Lupfer. This includes the following highways... Interstate 90 between mile markers 0 and 27. Highway 2 between mile markers 45 and 196. Highway 93 N between mile markers 100 and 146. Highway 200 W between mile markers 8 and 63. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH

area.areaDesc: Flathead, Mission Valleys; Kootenai, Cabinet Region; Lower Clark Fork Region; West Glacier Region
